channel.title: Are the devs working on s.a.m ore uses?
channel.description:
i left my game running on accedent during a 5 month vacay i have practically found every single s.a.m ore node and I have an entire industrial container full of it+ rlly long conveyors with it completely full wtf can I do with this s*** i cant ausom sink it build anything with it or do anything it is just there

item.title: Are the devs working on s.a.m ore uses?

i left my game running on accedent during a 5 month vacay i have practically found every single s.a.m ore node and I have an entire industrial container full of it+ rlly long conveyors with it completely full wtf can I do with this s*** i cant ausom sink it build anything with it or do anything it is just there

What item gives the most ausom sink points? General
i am trying to be able to brag on my brother with the most amount of tickets for the ausom shop I have almost every item in the game going into my sink settup but I am still needing more my brother currently can print 45 billion tickets I can only print 3,900 tickets but science my brother is on a few week hike at philmont(a gorgus gorgus mountain in Mexico) i am able to work on my setup idc if it takes me 5 hours or 100 days what is the item that gives the most points pls help me

New bug(maby hidden feature) with nuclear waste General
I have a let’s play world with 4,000 power plants (nuclear power plants) I hit 4 googles of uranium waste (not plutonium) and I haven’t put down a single-particle accelerator for plutonium power but once I hit 4 googles of uranium waste I started getting plutonium wast so I went to the nuclear setup and all my uranium fuel rods where now plutonium fuel rods and all my other uranium things where now plutonium things and I don’t have any of it attached to a blender or particle accelerator. once a…
